org.fhnw.aigs.Minesweeper.commons

Class SetUpBoardMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication.Message
      • org.fhnw.aigs.Minesweeper.commons.SetUpBoardMessage

  • public class SetUpBoardMessage
extends org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication.Message
    This message is used by the Minesweeper clients to initialize a game. The player can easily control the setup of the game like this, e.g. via prompt. This message will then be interpreted by the server and will be used in the process of the "setUpFields" method.
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Matthias St√∂ckli
